sp_instance.title: Welcome
sp_instance.widget_parameters:
{ "html": { "value": "

Give a Legendary Shout Out

Have you witnessed a team member exceptionally demonstrating our I&MT values (eg. OZ principles, goal cards, L.E.A.D. etc.) We want to hear about it! Complete this form and their notable performance will be promoted throughout the company and eligible for a 'Legendary Shout Out' Award.

The Details

  • Shout-Out is promoted to manager, Director & VPs.
  • Nominee receives 5 points & nominator receives 1 point to redeem for prizes.
  • Recognition Committee selects individuals for $125 Award and announces monthly.
", "displayValue": "

Give a Legendary Shout Out

Have you witnessed a team member exceptionally demonstrating our I&MT values (eg. OZ principles, goal cards, L.E.A.D. etc.) We want to hear about it! Complete this form and their notable performance will be promoted throughout the company and eligible for a 'Legendary Shout Out' Award.

The Details

  • Shout-Out is promoted to manager, Director & VPs.
  • Nominee receives 5 points & nominator receives 1 point to redeem for prizes.
  • Recognition Committee selects individuals for $125 Award and announces monthly.
" } }
